title: 2024 Hengdian International Golf Elite Professional Tournament - Pro-Am Philippines Division Signing Ceremony
content: Preparations are in full swing for the prestigious 2024 Hengdian International Golf Elite Professional Tournament - Pro-Am Philippines Division, set to showcase top Chinese professional players alongside amateurs in a world-class event. Jointly hosted by the China Golf Association and Hengdian Group, this tournament offers a unique platform for players to compete and for golf enthusiasts to engage with professionals. Recently, the signing ceremony for the Philippines Division took place in Manila, marking a pivotal moment as Hengdian Golf Culture Co., Ltd. and New Element Holdings Co., Ltd. joined forces. The event drew a distinguished gathering including key figures from the Philippine golf community, industry leaders, and renowned professionals. Scheduled to kick off on July 26, 2024, at The Orchard Golf and Country Club, the Philippines trials will feature multiple rounds culminating in the selection of top performers who will advance to the Hengdian Elite Tournament. This initiative not only aims to elevate the Philippines' standing in international golf but also promises to boost sports tourism in the region. Stay tuned as we bring you more updates on this exciting event, promisin an unparalleled sports spectacle for golf enthusiasts worldwide.
